summary: REQ-96 is partially implemented: the splash screen component now renders the company name string, retains click-to-skip, fade-out, auto-timeout, and reduced-motion handling. However, the rendered text is forced to uppercase via CSS (so it will not display with the exact capitalization required), and the diff introduces additional UI/visual elements (Skip button, decorative circles) that were not requested and may violate the non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the company name text exactly as "Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet" (matching spelling and capitalization) as the primary branding text.
missing_requirements.reason: The heading applies the Tailwind class `uppercase`, which will render the text as all-caps, not with the exact capitalization specified in the requirement/AC.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not change the splash screen background theme/animations beyond what is required to update the displayed company name text.
missing_requirements.reason: The splash screen adds decorative floating circle elements and introduces additional animations/classes not clearly required for changing the branding text.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a visible "Skip" button on the splash screen (in addition to click/tap anywhere).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-96 only requires preserving click/tap-to-skip behavior; adding new splash UI controls is not requested and may be considered a splash asset/UI change beyond the text update.

hallucinated_features.description: Added decorative floating circle elements (visual assets/effects) to the splash screen.
